item.title: This $1.5 million Star Trek home theater is Trekkie heaven
item.description:
This $1.5 million Star Trek home theater is Trekkie heaven

A millionaire's mind-boggling Star Trek-themed theater took four years to build.

item.title: BenQ Adds Bluetooth Speaker to i500 LED Mini Projector - rAVe [Publications]
item.description:
BenQ Adds Bluetooth Speaker to i500 LED Mini Projector - rAVe [Publications]

BenQ America just introduced the i500 projector, a short-throw LED projector that's just 3.3 pounds and 3 inches tall (about the size of a tablet). The i500 can project an 80-inch image from 3 feet from the wall or screen. The i500 is a 500 lumen, single-chip DLP that's native WXGA (1280Ã—800) resolution and uses ...

item.title: How to Become a Millionaire in the Audio/Video Business
item.description:
How to Become a Millionaire in the Audio/Video Business

The old adage in Napa Valley is that, if you want to become a millionaire in the wine business, start with $20,000,000. This is becoming truth in the specialty audio/video business, as well. This business was created and supported by Baby Boomers back in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
